message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product.  Let me know what you think.

I understand that $12,000 is a bit steep for you, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10,500. This is my final counteroffer, so I hope you can make it work.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $10,500 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $9,500.  If that's not acceptable, I'm going to have to consider buying from John.
